title: As you can see, I have a bellsouth e-mail so I know you will not respond to me. My question is \Why don\'t you print the questions on line that can\'t be answered by e-mail\"?"
text:
I don't understand your question. Questions that we can't answer
with an existing link or simple Google search usually result in
answers published online. There are exceptions, of course, but not
many.
